title: Five Number Summary: Apps for Students and Teachers
question_text:
A statistician conducted a survey at her school about the number of apps on a person’s phone. A five number summary displays the results.
Which of the following statements MUST be true?
Number of Apps for Students and Teachers
Number of AppsMinQ1MedianQ3Max
Students04192451
Teachers3224149124

choices.text: The teachers have a higher standard deviation and a higher median.
The students have a higher variance and a higher range.
The teachers have a higher interquartile range and a higher median.
The teachers have a lower standard deviation and a higher median.
The students have a higher median and a higher mode.
